body: Worst phone ever. Wasted my money. I am writing this review after 7 months of use. I have been using redmi phones since last 4 years. Earlier phones were good, that's why bought this one. But this time totally waste of money. Now this brand can't be trusted anymore. Fake Chinese product.1. Fingerprint sensor doesn't work well. You have to touch sensor for long time to unlock the device.2. Camera is not good. Quad camera is just for show off. Other brand cameras are quite better. Front camera is normal.3. Battery backup is worst. Battery gets drained within 3-4 hours of normal use(not playing games, just whatsApp and FB). Charger is also fake and not fast charging. It's normal charger and takes around 3 hours to full charge.4. The worst part is that when I unlock the device, always a black screen appears with a message "Don't cover the earphone area", even if I am not touching the phone area. The picture of the message is attached here. It's very irritating and sometimes I feel like crushing the phone with a hammer. Most of time during whatsApp call, there is complete black screen and the phone gets hanged and the call has to be disconnected as nothing works.This problem started within 3-4 months of use and it has become more frequent now. I thought the problem will be solved after update but nothing happened. Now I am frustrated with the problem and want to resolve the problem soon but don't know what to do. Does the warranty cover such issues? I want repair or replacement of the phone.Worst phone ever. Will never buy this brand in future again. Worthless Chinese product.
title: Worst phone ever. Totally waste of money. Not recommended.

body: Pros: phone volume is good, looks good, battery backup is ok ok. I started with Pros just to start, but frankly speaking, I am not satisfied with this mobile. In fact the Pros I have written will usually be there in almost all the phone if we choose them(I mean we select phone or its color basing on the looks)ConsSecurity:  Finger print sensor doesn't work sometimes and face detection is worst(phone gets unlocked even when i wear a mask)Finger print sensor: If we touch twice on the Finger print sensor,  phone works automatically, means brightness increases, network settings get opened and so on.Network: there is some issue with this phone, can't explain as I'm not a techie but, Airtel network works good in this area EXCEPT in this mobile.Worst thing is can't access service center due to COVID-19 pandemic and the service center is around 55 km.This review is for my phone(Redmi Note 8,black), may not be the same in all the phones of this model.Writing the review after eight month usage

body: Is it still worth in 2020??I was trying to buy the Note 9 but thanks to the so called SALE..I could not be lucky to get one. So I decided to go for this. Almost same specifications on paper and just a difference of battery size, so I thought if giving it a try.Wow...I really liked the design....Glass on both side and the colour gradient at the back really makes a look worth.There is a triple slot for 2 sim and a memory. Ir blaster present. Secondry mic and volume rockers. Fingerprint sensor placed at back. So from outside it's all worth the price. But the real story is placed inside. So let's jump in.Performance is media core and high end gamers are advised to stay away. 4gb ram is good for normal games and day to day operation. Phone is not hanging -atleast as of now.Battery can give you whole day juice provided you are a normal user. If you are a power user., You will have to charge by 3 pm. No heating issue noticed. Now the camera. And I am disappointed with the 48mp performance. The colours look dull and moved. Low light performance is absolute terrible. Flash will make your photo pale yellow. So totally unsatisfied. Selfie camera is good but specially me don't like that extra powder on the face. Video was satisfactory however not that stable.My conclusion is not for you but for the company. Make two phones ina year but make sure they have good hardware's, it's of no use to change model by keeping all the same specs and just changing a part. I was not at all happy with this dull player specially the camera part.
title: Is it still worth in 2020??

body: 🔆Got it for a friend and here are my observations for it. ♦️Pros :🔹️Extremely budget device.👍🔹️Bigger 6.3-inch IPS Full HD+ screen👍🔹️Many back camera allowing for variety of shots, depth , macro or ultrawide shots.👍🔹️Strong construction with corning gorilla glass 5 on the front and back.👍🔹️Infrared blaster, hence the handset can serve as remote.👍🔹️Fingerprint sensor at the back for additional security.👍🔹️Supports latest Bluetooth version 5.👍🔹️Decently fast AI enabled mid-range processor snap dragon 665 for medium level gaming.👍🔹️Fingerprint repellent front and back glass body.👍🔹️Good full day battery of 4000 mAh backup with 18-watt fast charger.👍🔹️Dual 4G Volte enabled sim with a dedicated separate microsd slot.👍🔹️Good selfie shots 👍And the .........♦️Cons:🔸️Extremely protruded camera lens that presents difficulty in laying it flat on back.👎🔸️ Quite heavy and feels wider & thicker in hand.Offering android 9 only , whereas Samsung offering android 10.👎🔸️6000 mAh battery is being offered in Samsung.👎🔸️Pretty dull screen contrast compared to Samsung amoled.👎🔸️Not very loud sound through speakers.👎🔸️Overall package is less compared to similar priced Samsung👎 🤏 Final verdict:*********************🔹️Considering the overall package, I suppose Samsung M21 offers a better value for the price in camera , battery , processor , android version looks and in hand feel.🔹️Yet for those interested in something other than Samsung in extreme budget, redmi note 8 is surely the next best thing.⭐Do click helpful below , if the review helps .
title: ☝️ For an overall package , second best alternative to samsung, in budget segment.

The notch is small which is great.6. RAM and Internal Memory are quite good at this price point.7. The processor is super fast.8. Build quality is good.Cons:1. While watching videos, screen quality seems to have degraded a lot. While performing other actions, the screen looks quite good.2. The temperature of the device reaches an abnormal temperature after 30-40 minutes of gaming.3. IPS Display which is HDR Enabled is not up to the mark.4. The camera is not up to the mark.Though anyone can opt for this device, despite these cons as it as an overall beast in this price segment.

A lot of us use our phones as hotspot in these COVID times when WiFi is down. I keep it right next to my laptop when using it as hotspot but battery drains really quickly.3. Picture quality from GCAM gets improved to some other level. Better install GCAM to take full advantage of cameras.4, As it has Corning Gorilla Glass on both front and back, so, always use it with protection on both sides otherwise you will fall in trouble very soon.5. Somehow Data Network is not working properly for me. I could be an issues specific to my phone but when I use the same SIM in a different phone data network works as per expectations. Strange!
title: Nitpicking review for a nice phone.

body: This phone is not available in offline market and even if it is available they sell with for 2k-1k more. I waited for this phone on amazom for a long time and I got the 64/4 variant in black colour from the Darshita etel seller. The phone is simply wow!! This price of this phone has increased from that of its release price,earlier it was 11k for64/4 but I got it for 12k on amazon and since I exchanged old phone i got for 10k. This phone is gorgeous,espically the black colour it looks very classy. My earlier phone was a redmi too.Even thot ppl blame chinese products, redmi gives ppl something which samsung can't even dream about. Go for it without doubt. Awesome phone. The display is so good. The back panel is glasssy and classy. The phone is light weight and can be handled with one hand easily bcoz even i was worried about this enormous phone size bcoz i was using note 3 earlier wic was just 5'5 inches so uprading to 6+ was big worry for me bcoz my hand is smaller size but its just so comfortable with one hand too. The drop notch is something new for me and very cool features. Took 9-10 days for delivery but was worth the wait for sure. Earlier i had decided to but redmi note 9 pro but after reading the horrible reviews about ppl on amazon i went with a older n much appreciated model that is note 8. Its a versatile phone for sure. Thanks amazon. The process of exchange was smooth
title: Wowwy!!!!!

body: I'm writing this review after 6 months. I bought it in Dec 2019 up to now (Jun 2020) it works completely great. It's a nice phone, the battery works for a day completely in normal usage, the camera is very good with the advantage of having multiple lenses like ultrawide, macro and depth sensor. While my phone variant is 4GB ram still works fine with some games I play. The fast charger 18w is another advantage at this price range. Overall as of my experience it's a great phone with this price. 🙂😊The only cons I found is; Only if the battery was 5000mah it would be very good, and if the back camera was little down to phone body (since it's a little bit stretched outside) it would be perfect.
